name: Sharn: City of Towers
description:
Will take a moment to load when played for the first-time. Best viewed with a three-button mouse on a desktop display. Mobile and touchpad support forthcoming.

An interactive diorama for the famous city found in the Eberron Campaign Setting for Dungeons & Dragons. Known for its vertical labyrinth of mile-high towers, Sharn is a fantasy metropolis. Infamously hard to get our heads around, players and DMs now have an interactive 3D display to understand the City of Towers in a whole new way.
